matrix_transform_vertex: This function transforms a vector by a matrix. You supply the transform matrix ID (as returned by the function matrix build()), as well as the x, y and z values for the vector to transform. The function will return an array of 3 elements where:
The x component of the transform vector
The y component of the transform vector
The z component of the transform vector

{ANY_CODE} t_matrix = matrix_build(0, 0, 0, 0, 90, 0, 1, 2, 1);
verts = matrix_transform_vertex(t_matrix, x, y, z);
The above code transforms the given values using the matrix stored in the variable "t_matrix" and stores them in the array "verts".
